description: Under the constitution written by the mythical lawgiver Lycurgus, the institution of the Agoge was established, where Spartans were trained from the age of 6 to be superior warriors in defense of the Spartan state.
tooltip: Champion Hoplites are available in p1, and may promote to Hippeis. They attack 0.1 seconds faster, take 20% less train and cost -25 food, -15 metal, -10 wood 50 metal. They have -50 health, -1 of hack and peirce resistance and do 15% less dmg compared to regular champion infantry spearman.
